name: barcody-barcode-scanner-for-anything
description: Monorepo for Barcody with web, mobile, and admin dashboard
author: Nishan Paul

scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=web-app && npm run lint --workspace=mobile-app && npm run lint --workspace=admin-dashboard
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=backend && npm run format --workspace=web-app && npm run format --workspace=mobile-app && npm run format --workspace=admin-dashboard
scripts.format-check: npm run format-check --workspace=backend && npm run format-check --workspace=web-app && npm run format-check --workspace=mobile-app && npm run format-check --workspace=admin-dashboard
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=web-app && npm run type-check --workspace=mobile-app && npm run type-check --workspace=admin-dashboard
scripts.test:unit: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=web-app && npm run test --workspace=mobile-app && npm run test --workspace=admin-dashboard
